content.p: The Registrar, Dr Paul Greatrix, is the Senior Administrative Officer at The University of Nottingham. His department delivers professional services and informs policy making within the University on student issues and student recruitment, as well as corporate communications activity. The department seeks to provide high quality support across many aspects of campus life and University busines. It does this through five divisions: For further information please visit the Registrarâ€™s Department website. More information on the Registrar's Department
